descriptionlist.description: Bring back the iOS 9 style "Slide To Unlock" to iOS 13!
descriptionlist.longdescription:
This tweak simply brings back the iOS 9 slide to unlock gesture in lockscreen back to iOS 13.

How does it work?

- NineUnlock utilizes the gesture to access Today View in iOS Lockscreen, which is a swipe right gesture, and replace the Today View with the Passcode Screen. Therefore this tweak will not work properly if you have installed a tweak to disable Today View!

changelog.change: - Fixed compatibility issues with other tweaks.
